short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate the title, description & comments of the Redmine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The plugin is intended to translate the title, description, and comment sections of Opentrends's Redmine issue.
 A Redmine issue may now be understood by the end-user without requiring external translation. Currently, this Plugin is optimized for English to Spanish and vise versa.

Note : This extension is designed for Opentrends Technologies and will only work with Opentrends subdomain.
